overview: In Buttman: Focused 7, director John Stagliano presents concentrated doses of intense, obsessive sex footage classified according to specific fetishes and kinks. This is a six-hour marathon of young, adventurous porn models teasing the camera and being coached through masturbatory reverie flavored according to their own (and the directors) wickedest inclinations. Freaky toys, nasty devices and gaping buttholes (a favorite obsession of Johns) are everywhere. Segments are devoted to WEDGIE, CAMEL TOE, WALKING BUTTS, MY NOSE YOUR CRACK, HOT BABES, TIGHT CLOTHES AND ASS, BOOBS, SUCK IT, MESSY, PUSSY TEASE, PUSSY CLOSE-UP, DOUBLE PENETRATION, ORGASM, BARE ASS AND GAPES, BUTTHOLES and TIT .
title: Buttman Focused 7
